page.title: ActionDataBase Installation
page.content:
1.- Copy the solution file and the license file to its SharePoint server

2.- Copy the license file (lic) in the folder c:\windows\system32

3.- Open a window commands (CMD)

3.1 - Go to the directory where the administration tool STSADM.EXE is, mostly in "c:\program files\common files\microsoft shared\web server extension\12\bin\" or "c:\archivos de programa\archivos comunes\microsoft shared\web server extension\12\bin\"

3.2 - Add the solution, typing in:

stsadm -o add solution -filename SPSProfessional.SharePoint.WebParts.ActionDataBase.wsp

3.3 - Unfold the solution, typing in:

stsadm -o deploysolution -name SPSProfessional.SharePoint.WebParts.ActionDataBase.wsp 
-local -allowgacdeployment -allcontenturls -allowCasPolicies
